status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Support and integrate doze management. Doze essentially cycles on and off states for apps which changes an app's execution schedule. Affects alarm and network capabilities. e.g. real time messaging/notification.
fields.summary: Android N: Implement support for Doze

comments.body:
After testing with KitchenSink app and custom Titanium app using notifications, it works fine. There is nothing we need to do.

We don't use AlarmManager, SyncAdapters, etc which are effected by deep doze. As for networks requests it works fine.

Used latest SDK (6.2.0) and latest CLI 6.2.0 on Android 7 device.
